name: replace formulas in Excel
description: open a xlsx or xslm file in winzip, allow to edit the content of the sheets in plain xml.
content:
<conditionalFormatting sqref="R159">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="79" priority="1317" stopIfTrue="1" operator="lessThan">
      <formula>R158</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="J428:J429 J431">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="78" priority="1319" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D428:I428),J428)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="R101">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="77" priority="1324" stopIfTrue="1" operator="lessThan">
      <formula>R99</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="D493:I493 Q217:Q218 D217:N218">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="76" priority="1325" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D215,D208),D217)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="J421:J422 J480:J481 J487:J488 J424 J483 J490 J368:J371 J375:J378 J360:J363">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="75" priority="1326" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D360:I360),J360)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="J484">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="74" priority="1327" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(J480:J481,J483),J484)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="73" priority="1328" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D484:I484),J484)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="J381">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="72" priority="1329" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(J372,J379),J381)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="71" priority="1330" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D381:I381),J381)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="K383:L383">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="70" priority="1333" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(K364,K381),K383)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="J493">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="69" priority="1334" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(J491,J484),J493)</formula>
    </cfRule>
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="68" priority="1335" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D493:I493),J493)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="M545:N545 M554:N554 M561:N561 M542:N543 M551:N552 M558:N559">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="67" priority="1336" stopIfTrue="1" operator="notEqual">
      <formula>MargError(SUM(D542,G542,J542),M542)</formula>
    </cfRule>
  </conditionalFormatting>
  <conditionalFormatting sqref="G600">
    <cfRule type="cellIs" dxfId="66" priority="1337" stopIfTrue="1" opera
author: mkoenings
